This page includes schedule for the Spring 2026 semester, along with all the assigned readings and graded events.

*OpenIntro Statistics* and *Introduction to Modern Statistics* are both available as a free e-book. They can be downloaded from the links in the course letter, or they can be found in the course Teams page.
